column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I heard really good things about this place
column2: so I was excited to try it. However
column3: my experience was much worse than I expected. I went with my friend during the week and we sat at the bar for drinks and tapas. We started with the sangria the the pintxo platter
column4: which was free with the foursquare check in for first time guests. It took almost 20 minutes to get our drinks
column5: and the place wasn't even busy. When we were ready to order more
column6: the bartender was oblivious and had forgotten all about us. After about 15 more minutes
column7: he finally returned and we ordered the cheese plate and the spicy potatoes.
